titleStmt.title: Hrafnkels saga Freysgoða – Reading Edition with Complete Lemmatisation

respStmt.resp: Editing, normalisation of the text, lemmatisation and morphological encoding

notesStmt.note: Parts of the XML encoding, lemmatisation and and morphological encoding were done by Lina Suhm (first chapter) and Lena Kremer (second chapter), who both were participants of a reading course at the University of Tübingen in the winter term 2015/16.

sourceDesc.ab: The text of Hrafnkels saga Freysgoða follows Guðni Jónsson's edition from 1945 as presented on heimskringla.no.

projectDesc.ab: This text has been encoded according to the standard set out by the Guidlines of the Text Encoding Initiative.

normalization.ab: The normalisation is done according to the Guidelines of the ONP.

correction.ab: This text has been thoroughly proofread and cross-checked by the editor before publication.

interpretation.ab: This text has been fully lemmatised and morphologically analysed based on the rules specified in ch. 11 of the Menota Handbook, v. 3.0.
Additonal encoding was used to describe noun stems and verb classes. Hereby, the key i, describing the inflectional class in Menota's encoding, is adjusted as key for noun stems and verb classes.
Weak verb classes, if possible, are encoded as W1, W2, W3 or W4. Strong verb classes, if possible, are encoded as S1, S2, S3, S4, S5 or S6.

The values for the encoding of noun stems are: A, JA, WA, IA, O, JO, WO, IO, I, U, R, RT (root stem), ND, AN, ON, JN (for jan- or jōn-stem), IN. If no stem could be identified, the value is UA (unassigned).
